description: Gets the number of visible entities of the specified type for the specified component in this drawing view.

parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get the visible EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

returns: Number of visible entities of EntityType in LpViewComponent
remarks:
Visible entities are entities that are not completely obscured by other entities in the view.
Call this method to get the size of the array returned by
IView::IGetVisibleEntities2
.
The difference between this method and the now obsolete IView::GetVisibleEntityCount method is that this method gets the correct number of silhouette edges (EntityType = swViewEntityType_e.swViewEntityType_SilhouetteEdge).
